analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MyRefundableCrowdsale.claimRefundOnUnsuccessfulEvent (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#620-632):
	External calls:
	- refundedValue = vault.myRefund(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#625-628)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#628-632)

Reentrancy in SilcCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#903-916):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#908-909)
	- token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#913-914)
	- token.mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#914-915)
	- token.mint(_advisoryFund,tokensForAdvisory) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#915-916)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#916)

Reentrancy in SilcCrowdsale.refundRequest (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol):
	External calls:
	- tokenValance = token.balanceOf(contributor) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol)
	- silcToken.burn(contributor,tokenIssued[contributor]) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenIssued (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol)
_stage in SilcCrowdsale.setCrowdsaleStage (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#805) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#516-529) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#524-525)

SilcCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#861-874) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#867-868)

SilcCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#903-916) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#913-914)
	-token.mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#914-915)
	-token.mint(_advisoryFund,tokensForAdvisory) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#915-916)

SilcCrowdsale.mintSilcToken (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#917-919) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#919)

SilcCrowdsale.getTokenIssued.token (local variable @ /unique_chucks/21/0x84e60b87d8e75e45d813ad24ead8dce84c74189b.sol#876) shadows:
